name: Matrimania
description:
Matrimania is a simple single player or co-op  puzzle game that I made for my friends' engagement. It was developed in game maker studio and took roughly 4 days from start to finish.

Features
  • Play in the browser - No download required!
  • 10 different levels, each more taxing than the last!
  • Single player or co-op gameplay!
  • Two people can play with just one controller!
  • Blazing 8 colour graphics!
How To Play

The aim of each level is to help the two lovebirds find each other so they can get married. Sadly, their world is full of dangerous crushing blocks, impassable doors and evil doppelgangers hell bent on ruining their big day!

Controls

Player 1 - W/S/A/D or left stick on gamepad

Player 2  - I/K/J/L or right stick on gamepad

When using touch controls, touch your finger near the player you want to move and a virtual joystick will appear. Then slide your finger in the direction you want them to move.
